EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: definitively on 7 December 2011, in accordance with article 39(1).

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations,Treaty Series,vol. 2797, p.75; Doc. TD/TIMBER.3/12.

TreatyNote.Text: The above Agreement was adopted on 27 January 2006 at Geneva by the United Nations Conference for the Negotiation of a Successor Agreement to the International Tropical Timber Agreement, 1994. In accordance with its article 36, the Agreement shall be open for signature at United Nations Headquarters in New York from 3 April 2006 until one month after the date of its entry into force, by Governments invited to the United Nations Conference for the Negotiation of a Successor Agreement to the International Tropical Timber Agreement, 1994.
